summary: I added an armory Basement and Cleaned up clutter and cobwebs
descriptionHtml:
I went and re-Arranged the kitchen Cleared some of the useless clutter replaced old grungy bed with a new nice one. I also built a basement from scratch complete with an alchemy table Enchanting table WORKING Mannequins and Weapon Racks, as well as a full smithy.
Now you can have a childs bedroom AND an Alchemy station!
I did not use anyone elses mods in this one it is built from scratch.

IMPORTANT NOTE

DO NOT LOAD THIS MOD WITH A SAVE INSIDE OF BREEZEHOME AS THE MANNEQUINS WILL WALK AROUND.

I will be replacing more of the current furniture with new nicer ones in the near future.

Please report any bugs to me to have them fixed.
Please endorse

OPTIONAL/RECOMMENDED MODS 
Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix by SLuckyD If your mannequins are being buggy and walking around use this mod to fix that. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652/?
author: Darkness9653
